§7[Lightning Bolt]§1

Sky Magick is known for its strong winds and increased mobility but most don't understand that it can also be powerful and destructive. §7Lightning Bolt§1 is one such spell that displays this.§r
§1With focus, a Witch can call down a single bolt of lightning six blocks ahead in the direction they are looking.
